Package com.company.rest.products.controller

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.rest.products.controller.ProductController
  • @RestController
@Component
public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point to API. Decouples response and business logic by offloading all heavy lifting to BackendService, following an MVC pattern.
    See Also:
    BackendService, ResponseEntity, ResponseMessage

      • getAll

        @GetMapping("/products")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> getAll​(@PathVariable(required=false,name="page")
                                                                       java.lang.Integer pageIdx,
                                                                       @PathVariable(required=false,name="items_in_page")
                                                                       java.lang.Integer itemsInPage,
                                                                       @PathVariable(required=false,name="sort_by")
                                                                       java.lang.String sortBy)
        Entry point for a GET ALL request.
        Parameters:
        pageIdx - the current index of the page in the paginated response.
        itemsInPage - the number of items in the current page.
        sortBy - the field of LiteProduct which we will use for sorting the products.
        Returns:
        an appropriate JSON response.
        See Also:
        BackendService.getAllProducts(Integer, Integer, String)
